.. py:module:: synspot.personalinformation
.. py:currentmodule:: synspot.personalinformation

:py:mod:`~synspot.personalinformation` Module
==============================

The :py:mod:`~synspot.personalinformation` module contains a class of the same name to
represent the color palette of palette mapped images.

.. note::

    The :py:class:`~synspot.personalinformation` class has several methods,
    but they are all marked as "experimental." Read that as you will. The
    ``[source]`` link is there for a reason.

.. autoclass:: synspot.personalinformation.PersonalInformation
    :members:
